title: Crisil upgrades rating on Adani Power bank loan facilities
description: Crisil Ratings upgrades Adani Power's loan facilities to 'AA-', citing strong improvement in business and financial risk profile. The upgrade is driven by better-than-expected operating performance, timely commissioning of power plants, recovery of pending regulatory dues, and improvement in receivables.
